title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing 'finish' in the JAR packager, the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed.
OB: The JAR packager fails to create the JAR when there are unsaved editors.
EB: I should be able to create a JAR with unsaved editors. If there are unsaved editors, a dialog should prompt to allow saving before creating the JAR.
SR: 1. Open a file and make some edits without saving.2. Open the JAR packager for the project that contains the unsaved file.3. Enter all the necessary details such as path, destination, name of JAR packager description, etc.4. Attempt to create the JAR packager.
